title: GRANTS_TO_ROLES View (Account Usage): Match SHOW GRANTS TO ROLE command | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: This behavior change is in the 2024_01 bundle.
For the current status of the bundle, refer to Bundle History.
The behavior of the Account Usage GRANTS_TO_ROLES view is as follows:
The output of the view is not consistent with a SHOW GRANTS TO ROLE command: the view does not list all of the grants to each role.
The output of the view is consistent with a SHOW GRANTS TO ROLE command based on the set of enabled features in your Snowflake account.
